title: (x) Bata logo - custom logo, similar to Eclat {Stephen}
content:
I was so close to finding what type this is but completely missed :) Anybody seen this font? Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Bata-logo.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063400/http:/typophile.com/files/Bata-logo.gif) | 3.93 KB |

 [‹ (x) Looking for fat, confident fonts with rounded edges - various {gang}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33598 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Similar to Beaumarchais - Columbus (Beaumarchais, Deneane) {Yves, Angel} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080711063400/http:/www.typophile.com/node/33604 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mbalaic

comments.content: I don’t think this is a font as the Bata logo looks like this since the pre-digital era (1920s/30s or even earlier). Unless they had one made in the meantime that is, but that would be most probably exclusive to them.
Forgot to add that Bata is a shoe company running since the end of the 19th century i think.
Yeah, you’re right. But Eclat is a good start, definitly. Thanks guys.
